name: claude-harness
description: Long-running agent harness with PRD analysis, unified workflow, 5-layer memory architecture, failure prevention, self-improving skills, always-on TDD via Agent Teams (test-writer, implementer, reviewer specialists with acceptance testing gate), bug fix tracking, GitHub integration, Agent Teams as sole orchestration model, parallel work streams, native Tasks integration, effort-optimized phases, 128K output support, autonomous multi-feature batch processing, dynamic command sync, full hook coverage (14 registrations: branch safety, async verification, teammate context injection, failure learning, TDD phase validation with acceptance gate, autonomous acceleration, compaction recovery), and consolidated command set (5 commands)
